author: Staff Reporter
text:
A traffic police officer was injured after a car hit him while he was involved in a vehicle check on Friday night.

Soundarapandian, a traffic enforcement inspector, was regulating traffic at Neelangarai around 8 p.m. on Friday. At this juncture, a car driven by Arumugam (42), hit him. The police officer sustained injuries on the head, hips and hands and was admitted to the hospital.
title: Policeman injured
